deity.name: None
deity.description: Due to closed content PCGEN cannot provide a list of deities, sorry but you need to homebrew your own list; Please see the Documentation for how to do so - http://www.pcgen-test.org/autobuilds/pcgen-docs/listfilepages/lstfileclass/lfc_lesson14_deities.html
deity.domainlist: Air, Animal, Chaos, Death, Destruction, Earth, Evil, Fire, Good, Healing, Knowledge, Law, Luck, Magic, Plant, Protection, Strength, Sun, Travel, Trickery, War, Water
deity.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdbasiccharacterclassesi

skills.list_mods: Alchemy +3, Craft (Weaponsmithing) +6, Disable Device +3, Listen +3, Search +3, Spot +3

turning.notes: You destroy Undead creatures with total hit dice up to 1.

feat.name: Extra Turning
feat.description: Allows a character to turn undead four more times per day than normal.

feat.name: Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
feat.description: When a character wears a type of armor with which the character is proficient, the armor check penalty applies only to Balance, Climb, Escape Artist, Hide, Jump, Move Silently, Pick Pocket, and Tumble checks.

feat.name: Armor Proficiency (Light)
feat.description: When a character wears a type of armor with which the character is proficient, the armor check penalty applies only to Balance, Climb, Escape Artist, Hide, Jump, Move Silently, Pick Pocket, and Tumble checks.

feat.name: Armor Proficiency (Medium)
feat.description: When a character wears a type of armor with which the character is proficient, the armor check penalty applies only to Balance, Climb, Escape Artist, Hide, Jump, Move Silently, Pick Pocket, and Tumble checks.

feat.name: Shield Proficiency
feat.description: The character can use a shield and suffer only the standard penalties.

feat.name: Simple Weapon Proficiency
feat.description: The character makes attack rolls with simple weapons normally.

ability_object.name: +2 racial bonus on Listen, Search, and Spot checks. An elf who merely passes within 5 feet of a secret or concealed door is entitled to a Search check to notice it as if she were actively looking for the door.
ability_object.description: +2 racial bonus on Listen, Search, and Spot checks. An elf who merely passes within 5 feet of a secret or concealed door is entitled to a Search check to notice it as if she were actively looking for the door.

ability_object.name: +2 racial saving throw bonus against Enchantment spells or effects.
ability_object.description: +2 racial saving throw bonus against Enchantment spells or effects.

description.para: +2 racial saving throw bonus against enchantment spells or effects.
Proficient with either longsword or rapier; proficient with shortbow, longbow, composite longbow, and composite shortbow.

+2 racial bonus on Listen, Search, and Spot checks. An elf who merely passes within 5 feet of a secret or concealed door is entitled to a Search check to notice it as if she were actively looking for the door.

ability_object.name: Immunity to magic sleep spells and effects.
ability_object.description: Immunity to magic sleep spells and effects.

ability_object.name: Low-Light Vision
ability_object.description: An elf can see twice as far as a human in starlight, moonlight, torchlight, and similar conditions of poor illumination. She retains the ability to distinguish color and detail under these conditions.

ability_object.name: Low-Light Vision
ability_object.description: You can see 2x as far as humans in low illumination. Characters with low-light vision have eyes that are so sensitive to light that they can see twice as far as normal in dim light. Low-light vision is color vision. A spellcaster with low-light vision can read a scroll as long as even the tiniest candle flame is next to her as a source of light. Characters with low-light vision can see outdoors on a moonlit night as well as they can during the day.

ability_object.name: Proficient with either longsword or rapier; proficient with shortbow, longbow, composite longbow, and composite shortbow.
ability_object.description: Proficient with either longsword or rapier; proficient with shortbow, longbow, composite longbow, and composite shortbow.

domain.name: Law
domain.power: You cast law spells at +1 caster level.

domain.name: Protection
domain.power: You can generate a protective ward, a spell-like ability to grant someone you touch a resistance bonus on their next saving throw equal to your level. It's an abjuration effect that lasts one hour, once per day.

character.weapon_proficiencies: Blowgun, Club, Crossbow (Heavy), Crossbow (Light), Dagger, Dagger (Punching), Dart, Gauntlet, Gauntlet (Spiked), Grapple, Halfspear, Javelin, Longbow, Longbow (Composite), Longsword, Mace, Mace (Heavy), Mace (Light), Morningstar, Quarterstaff, Shieldbash, Shortbow, Shortbow (Composite), Shortspear, Sickle, Sling, Spells(Ray), Unarmed Strike

spell.name: Create Water
spell.effect: Creates 4 gallons of pure water.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsc

spell.description: Creates (CASTERLEVEL*2) gallons of pure water.

spell.name: Cure Minor Wounds
spell.effect: Cures 1 point of damage.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsc

spell.description: Cures 1 point of damage.

spell.name: Detect Magic
spell.effect: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.
spell.target: Quarter circle emanating from the character to the extreme of the range

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsd

spell.description: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.

spell.name: Detect Poison
spell.effect: Detects poison in one creature or small object.
spell.target: One creature, one object, or a 5-ft. cube

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsd

spell.description: Detects poison in one creature or small object.

spell.name: Guidance
spell.effect: +1 on one roll, save, or check.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsg

spell.description: +1 on one roll, save, or check.

spell.name: Inflict Minor Wounds
spell.effect: Touch attack, 1 point of damage.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsi

spell.description: Touch attack, 1 point of damage.

spell.name: Light
spell.effect: Object shines like a torch.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsjkl

spell.description: Object shines like a torch.

spell.name: Mending
spell.effect: Makes minor repairs on an object.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsm

spell.description: Makes minor repairs on an object.

spell.name: Purify Food and Drink
spell.effect: Purifies 2 cu. ft. of food or water.
spell.target: 2 cu. ft. of contaminated food and water

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsp

spell.description: Purifies (CASTERLEVEL) cu. ft. of food or water.

spell.name: Read Magic
spell.effect: Read scrolls and spellbooks.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsqr

spell.description: Read scrolls and spellbooks.

spell.name: Resistance
spell.effect: Subject gains +1 on saving throws.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsqr

spell.description: Subject gains +1 on saving throws.

spell.name: Virtue
spell.effect: Subject gains 1 temporary hp.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsuvwxyz

spell.description: Subject gains 1 temporary hp.

spell.name: Bane
spell.effect: Enemies suffer -1 attack, -1 on saves against fear.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsb

spell.description: Enemies suffer -1 attack, -1 on saves against fear.

spell.name: Bless
spell.effect: Allies gain +1 attack and +1 on saves against fear.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsb

spell.description: Allies gain +1 attack and +1 on saves against fear.

spell.name: Bless Water
spell.effect: Makes holy water.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsb

spell.description: Makes holy water.

spell.name: Cause Fear
spell.effect: One creature flees for 1d4 rounds.

source.source: Wizards of the Coast - System Reference Document, srdspellsc

spell.name: Command
spell.effect: One subject obeys one-word command for 1 round.

spell.name: Comprehend Languages

spell.effect: Cures 1d8 + 2 damage.

spell.effect: Sees how wounded subjects within 30 ft. are.

spell.effect: The caster gains attack, damage bonus, +0.

spell.effect: One subject suffers -2 on attacks, damage, saves, and checks.

spell.effect: Ignores 5 damage/round from one energy type.

spell.name: Remove Fear
spell.effect: +4 on saves against fear for 1 subjects.
spell.target: 1 creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

spell.description: +4 on saves against fear for (CASTERLEVEL/4+1) subjects.

spell.name: Sanctuary
spell.effect: Opponents can't attack the caster, and the caster can't attack.
